questions.question: What is the overall shape of the primary seating structure?
What is the dominant color of the wooden frame?
What is the apparent material primarily composing the chair?
Considering the base, what is the functional type of this chair?
Describe the style of the vertical back slats—are they straight or curved?
What is the shape of the armrests, considering their ends?
Focusing on the legs, what decorative elements are visible at their base?
What is the general texture of the visible wood grain—smooth or coarse?
Based on the construction, what is the apparent finish on the wood?
Are there any noticeable visible joints or visible fasteners in the frame?
Considering the back support, how many vertical slats are visible?
Describe the style of the chair's overall design, e.g., modern, traditional?
What is the approximate height of the chair's back relative to the seat?
Does the chair appear to have any noticeable upholstery or cushions?
What is the shape of the rocking base, in reference to the overall structure?
